participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

dapi_q01.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Not able to do your homework or study for a test. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q02.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Got into fights, acted bad, or did mean things. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q03.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Missed out on other things because you spent too much money on drugs. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q04.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Went to work or school high. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q05.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. dapi_q07.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Relatives avoided you. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q08.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below. Please indicate how many times each has happened to you during the last six months while you were consuming drugs or as the result of your drug use (consider any drugs you've used, except caffeine, alcohol, nicotine and marijuana).  Felt that you needed more drugs than you used to use in order to get the same effect. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 6-10; 4 = 10+

dapi_q09.Description: Different things happen to people while they are consuming DRUGS or as a result of their DRUG use. Some of these things are listed below.
